page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content: On a normal day I get up at 8 o'clock I get dressed and go downstiars for my breakfast.I have some toast and some coffee.At 8.30 a.m. my friend Rachel calls for me and we walk to school. Sometimes I meet Elizabeth my friend. School starts at 9.00 a.m. and we have assembly.In the morning we usually do maths,some written work,reading or science.We have dinner at 12.00 noon and start again in the afternoon.We might do Art/Craft,Topic,Mucic,Science,History, reading our story.We can also change our library books.We also do P.E.and games.The youngest children in our school go home at 3.15. When I get home I watch TV.At 7.30 I go and practise my violin.At 8.00pm. I get washed and ready for bed. {Lisa Whitehead { } {(aged 11)
